title: Scientists dissect 3,500-year-old bear discovered in Siberian permafrost
description: A brown bear that lay almost perfectly preserved in the frozen wilds of eastern Siberia for 3,500 years has undergone a necropsy by a team of scientists after it was discovered by reindeer herders on a desolate island in the Arctic.

title: Mexico approves changes to electoral oversight, drawing criticism
description: Mexico's lawmakers approved an overhaul of the body overseeing the country’s elections, a move spearheaded by Pres. López Obrador that's drawing criticism, challenges.

title: Mexico's president hopes convicted former  security chief will turn informer
description: Mexico's president said he hopes convicted former security chief Genaro García Luna will cooperate with U.S. prosecutors and maybe implicate former Mexican presidents.

title: Capturing a year of war: A Ukrainian photographer's account of the Russian invasion
description: A Ukrainian photographer’s first-hand account of the Russian invasion.

title: Russia agrees to give mercenary group more ammunition after row, Wagner boss says
description: Yevgeny Prigozhin, founder of Russia’s Wagner Group mercenary force, said on Thursday that much-needed ammunition for his troops had been dispatched, after a public row in which he accused the military leadership of treason.

title: Pope Francis cancels speeches and appointments due to bad cold
description: Pope Francis canceled one audience and skipped speeches he was set to deliver Thursday because of a bad cold, the Vatican said.

title: Rescuers confirm 4 died after plane crashed on Philippine volcano
description: Searchers who hiked the slopes of a Philippine volcano to find the wreckage of a plane confirmed the four on board didn’t survive, the local mayor said.

title: Massive mine collapse in China leaves at least 5 dead and 48 missing
description: The death toll from the collapse of an open pit coal mine in northern China has risen to five, with 48people missing, a state broadcaster reported Thursday.

title: Putin vows to strengthen Russia's nuclear forces after suspending role in key treaty
description: President Vladimir Putin has said he plans to strengthen Russia's nuclear forces, as his invasion of Ukraine reaches the one-year mark.

title: Israel launches airstrikes in Gaza after deadly West Bank raid sparked rocket fire
description: Israeli fighter jets launched airstrikes in Gaza Thursday, after it said rockets were fired at its territory following a controversial arrest operation in the West Bank.

title: Australian man pleads guilty to 1988 killing of gay American man
description: Scott White pleaded guilty to the manslaughter of Scott Johnson, a gay American man who fell to his death from a Sydney cliff top that was a known gay meeting place in 1988.

title: Australian pleads guilty to killing gay American in 1988
description: An Australian pleaded guilty to the manslaughter of an American who fell to his death in 1988 from a Sydney cliff top that was known as a gay meeting place.

title: Ukrainian troops facing trench warfare with new Russian offensive
description: Ukrainian troops are in the trenches trying to stop a new Russian offensive in the East. NBC News’ Richard Engel is on the ground and spoke with one lieutenant about his experience in battle.

title: Biden calls Putin’s suspension of arms control treaty with U.S. a ‘big mistake’
description: President Biden called Russian President Putin’s announcement to suspend participation in its last remaining arms control treaty with the U.S. a “big mistake.” NBC News’ Kristen Welker has more details about the escalating tensions.
